home.chatActionSheet.title: Like to chat with us?
onboarding.text.intro: <text>BrightID uses the people you know</text><text>to enforce one-account-per-person</text><text>for important applications like</text><text>voting and universal basic income.</text>
onboarding.text.privacy: <text>Prove you're a unique person</text><text>while preserving your privacy.</text>
signup.header.title: SignUp
signup.text.whatsYouName: What do your friends know you by?
signup.text.infoNotShared: Your name and photo will never be shared with apps or stored on servers
signup.placeholder.name: Name
signup.alert.nameTooShort: Your name must be at least 2 characters
signup.alert.photoMissing: A photo is required. Please press enter on the keyboard.
recovery.header.title: Recovery Code
recovery.text.askTrustedConnections: Ask your trusted connections to scan this code.
qrcode.text.scanCode: <text>Hey {{name}}, scan a code and</text><text>make a new connection today</text>
qrcode.alert.text.codeSingle: This QR code can be used to connect with a single user before it expires.
qrcode.alert.text.codeGroup: This QR code is designed for many people to connect simultaneously.
qrcode.alert.shareLinkSingle: Share this link with one friend
qrcode.alert.connectGroup: Make a group connection with {{name}} on BrightID: {{link}}
connections.text.pendingConnections_plur: Waiting for {{count}} connections to confirm you.
connections.text.errorGeneric: There was an error, please try connecting with {{name}} again...
connections.text.errorExpired: The QRCode used to connect with {{name}} has expired... please try connecting again.
connections.text.waiting: Waiting for data from the profile service
connections.alert.text.expired: The QRCode used to connect has expired...
common.photoActionSheet.title: Select photo
common.camera.title: Permission to use camera
common.camera.message: We need your permission to use your camera
